name: Artisan's Hand
psi: HP Recovery: Restores all allies' HP to their state from 5s ago.
passive: Complete Repair: Increases Max HP by 2% every time healing is received, up to 20%.

name: Atomic Lighter
psi: Atomic Apocalypse: Continuously approaches the target, triggering a nuclear explosion after 5s that deals 2,040.3% AoE SP.ATK DMG. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Kindling: Upon Death, increases Attack of all remaining allied Deviations on the battlefield by 150% for 8s.

name: Atomic Snail
psi: Quantum Charge: Quickly flies toward allies, restoring 60 Psi Energy to each ally touched, repeating 6 times. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Crazy Snail: Effect is enhanced by 45% when using Speed Up or Deviant Energy Conduit.

name: Butterfly Emissary
psi: Mitsuko Storm: Release 6 butterflies, each dealing 248.9% P.ATK DMG to enemies. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Evasion Stance: 20% chance to gain a stack of Evasion Stance lasting 12s when taking DMG, up to 3 stacks.

name: Buzzy Bee
psi: Flower Thief: Buzzy Bee selects an enemy target, steals 60% of their Psi Energy, and restores 40% Psi Energy to an ally. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Bountiful Harvest: After 5 skill casts, recovers 10% Psi Energy.

name: By-the-Wind
psi: Wind Wall: Creates three wind walls that push enemies away and block incoming bullets for 8s. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Turbulence: 10% chance to knock enemies into the air when dealing damage.

name: Chaos Extradimensional Cat
psi: Cat Gathering: The cat dispels all negative states from allies and boosts their P.ATK and SP.ATK by 158.7% for 10s. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Cat's Virtues: When the cat buffs allies, restores HP equal to 3% of its own Max HP.

name: Chaos Mr Wish
psi: Data needed
passive: Data needed

name: Chaosaurus
psi: Pyro Dino Bombardment: Combines Telekinetic Hand with Pyro Dino magic, causing the Pyro Dino to spew explosive flame orbs at enemies. Consumes 600 Psi Energy.
passive: Flame Queen: Gains +80% SP.ATK DMG for 3s when attacking Burned units.

name: Chaos Snowsprite
psi: Frozen Soul: Creates a large ice crystal that charges for 5s before launching, dealing 1,416% SP.ATK DMG in an 8m radius and knocking down targets. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Chilling Cold: Each time damage is dealt to a target, increases the caster's SP.ATK by 5%, stacking up to 20 times. Switching targets resets the effect.

name: Chefosaurus Rex
psi: Hell's Kitchen: Creates a homing flame tornado that deals 90.8% SP.ATK DMG every 0.5s while inflicting Burn, lasting 13s. Burn deals 85.3% SP.ATK DMG per second. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Field Cooking: Upon killing a target, spawns a giant hamburger. Allies touching it restore 12.3% of Max HP to all allies within 5m.

name: Digby Boy
psi: Ore Crushing Process: Grows larger and frenziedly strikes the target 37 times, each hit dealing 41.5% P.ATK DMG and knocking back the target. The final strike deals 54% P.ATK DMG. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Workhorse: When HP falls below 30%, increases P.DEF by 60%.

name: Disco Ball
psi: Spotlight: Applies Spotlight to all nearby allies, keeping them safe from lethal DMG for 11s. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Let's Dance: Automatically casts a cost-free Healing Link every 10s.

name: Director Fox
psi: Beast Summon: Summon all 3 animals and fully restore their HP.
passive: Efficient Breeding: All allies within range receive a 3% healing boost for a short time.

name: Doctor Raven
psi: Lethal Surgery: Designate a target to put them in a surgical state, rendering them immobile. During the surgery, the HP percentages of the target and Doctor Raven are swapped.
passive: Plague: Each time you receive healing, release a plague on all nearby enemies, reducing their HP by 0.3% per second for 5 seconds.

name: Dr-Teddy
psi: Panacea: Transforms into a giant bear, healing surrounding allies every 0.5s for 180% of his Attack, 6 times in total. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Healer's Heart: When healing other targets, restores 20% of the healing amount to self.

name: Dreamcatcher
psi: Dreamcatcher: Deploys a large net at the target location. After 3s, enemies within range take 1672.5% P.ATK DMG and fall asleep for 12s. Taking damage ends the sleeping state. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Dreamless Tonight: Deviations controlled by the Dreamcatcher receive a 40% DMG Boost for 10s.

name: Electric Eel
psi: High Voltage Ring: Releases a 20m electric ring, dealing 254.3% SP.ATK DMG to all enemies in its path and restoring 160 Psi Energy to allies. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Electric Feedback: Gains 0.5 Psi Energy every time damage is dealt.

name: Enchanting Void
psi: Huggy Leopard: Transforms into a Black Panther for 30s, gaining exclusive battle skills. Battle Skill – Talon: Swipes consecutively at enemies in front, dealing 52.50% P.ATK DMG per hit. Battle Skill – Tail Sweep: Whips the tail to attack nearby enemies, dealing 122.30% P.ATK DMG. Battle Skill – Shadow Strike: Dashes forward, piercing through enemies in the path for 38.30% P.ATK DMG. Battle Skill – Instant Hell: Releases multiple Shadow Strikes, each dealing 56.90% P.ATK DMG to enemies in the path. Killing a target resets the cooldown of Instant Hell.
passive: Hunt: Black Cat deals only 50% DMG. Black Panther gains 10% Leech. Killing targets extends transformation duration by 45s.

name: Extradimensional Cat
psi: Cat Gathering: The cat dispels all negative states from allies and boosts their P.ATK and SP.ATK by 158.7% for 10s. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Cat's Virtues: When the cat buffs allies, restores HP equal to 3% of its own Max HP.

name: Festering Gel
psi: Gel Shield: Encases an ally in Festering Gel, granting a shield equal to 3.3% of their Max HP. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Activate: Increase the Healing Boost effect by 20%.

name: Fetch-lot-Bunny
psi: Bunny Crouch: Enters a defensive stance, taunting nearby enemies and gaining a shield equal to 1.5% of Max HP. After 5s, deals P.ATK DMG equal to 30% of damage taken to surrounding enemies. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Fairytale Guardian: Increases P.ATK and P.DEF by 18%.

name: Flame Essence
psi: Blazing Croak: Creates an expanding flame storm around the caster that deals 209% SP.ATK DMG to enemies within range and reduces the Elemental Defense of burned units by 20%. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Spring Legs: After casting the skill 3 times, leaps behind the target, gaining Super Armor during the leap. Enemies hit along the way are burned for 5s, taking 4% SP.ATK DMG per second.

name: Frog the Leaper
psi: Clockwork Bounce: Wind up surrounding enemies, then leap into the air. Upon landing, deals 450% P.ATK damage and knocks them down. Consumes all Clockwork stacks, increasing damage by 4% per stack. Costs 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Wind Up: Taking damage adds Clockwork stacks, with a 1s cooldown. Each stack grants 2% DMG Reduction, up to 30 stacks.

name: Gazocchio
psi: Annihilation Beam: Strikes the target location with an Annihilation Beam, dealing 512.10% P.ATK DMG, followed by 115% P.ATK DMG per second to enemies in range for 5s. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Multi-Cast: Up to 3 casts, with each cast having a 25% success rate.

name: Gingerbread House
psi: Happy Thanksgiving: Gingerbread House feeds all allies 3 desserts with random buff effects. Buffs from the same dessert can stack. Consumes 360 Psi Energy.
passive: Limited-time Feeding: Every 16s, the Gingerbread House feeds an ally a dessert with a random buff. Graham Cracker: Restores 2.8% Max HP. Chocolate: Increases P.DEF and SP.DEF by 81% for 8s. Candy Cane: Increases P.ATK by 130% for 8S. Lollipop: Increases SP.ATK by 130% for 8s.

name: Growshroom
psi: Colossal Pressure: Transforms into a colossal mushroom and leaps at the target, dealing P.ATK DMG equal to 9.8% of Max HP to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Divine Grace: During sunny weather, P.DEF +50%; during rainy weather, SP.DEF +50%.

name: Grumpy Bulb
psi: Chaos Mist: Generates dense miasma around the caster, dealing 1089.1% SP.ATK DMG to enemies and disrupting neural activity. All enemy AoE DMG will affect all units. Consumes 500 Psi Energy.
passive: Budding: After entering combat, spawns a small bulb randomly within 6m every 5s. Contact with an enemy triggers an explosion that reduces their Elemental and Physical Defense by 8%.

name: Hydronaut
psi: Fishdive: Charges randomly 10 times while holding a fish, reducing the number of charges by 1 for each enemy hit and knocking them back, dealing SP.ATK DMG equal to 522% Attack and applying Power Surge.
passive: Fishing: Fires a torpedo when hitting distant enemies. Cooldown: 10s.

name: H37
psi: Work Broadcast: H37 gains a shield equal to 9.4% of Max HP for 8s, then applies Shield Break to all allies. After 5s, detonates all shields to deal 1,450% SP.ATK DMG to enemies within a 5m radius. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Robot Leader: Allies shielded by H37 or affected by H37's Shield Break gain 11.1% P.DEF and SP.DEF.

name: Hug-in-a-Bowl
psi: Sweeping Aroma: Throws at an ally, creating a 7m radius aroma zone. All allies inside gain 70% of Hug-in-a-Bowl's Attack. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Porcelain: Reduces DMG taken by 27% when HP is above 50%.

name: Ice Pot
psi: Rapid Ice Formation: The Ice Pot releases a chilling aura, randomly spawning 3 Ice Cubes within range. Shattered Ice Cubes deal SP.ATK DMG equal to 258% Attack and inflict a brief frozen effect on nearby enemies.
passive: Ice Maker: Every 10s, summons an ice cube near an enemy.

name: Invincible Sun
psi: Falling Starcore: Summons 5 discarded stars to crash onto enemies, each dealing 537.5% SP.ATK DMG; also creates a burning area on the ground lasting 8s, dealing 107.5% SP.ATK DMG per second. Consumes 500 Psi Energy.
passive: Blazing Fury: For every 30% HP lost, SP.ATK +25.5%.

name: Lethal Rabbit
psi: Curtain Call Etiquette: Lethal Rabbit draws a dagger and teleports behind the target, slitting their throat for 1,353.3% P.ATK DMG and silencing the target for 5s. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Fatal Strike: After hitting a new target, all attacks will critically hit for the next 10s.

name: Logging Beaver
psi: Masterpiece Whirlwind: Swings a tree stump 5 times consecutively, each hit dealing 271.4% P.ATK DMG. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: True Grit: When taking damage, 12% chance to automatically trigger a cost-free whirlwind slash, dealing 100% P.ATK DMG.

name: Lonewolf Whisper
psi: Lonewolf's Roar: Transforms into an Elite Shadow Wolf, increasing Attack by 130% and gaining a shield equal to 5.6% of Max HP. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Fang of Fear: 20% chance to knock back enemies when dealing damage.

name: Masonic Pyramid
psi: Disassemble: Summons a Predator beside each ally. When an ally uses a skill, the Predator fires an energy projectile at the enemy locked on by that ally, dealing 279% P.ATK DMG and knocking back the target. Each Predator can fire up to 5 projectiles.
passive: Perception Block: Every 10s, makes the ally with the lowest HP invisible for 2s, breaking enemy lock-on.

name: Mini Feaster
psi: Distant Revelry: Mini Feaster summons a tentacle near each enemy, up to 4, while boosting its own Attack by 120%. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Empathic Touch: Tentacles inherit Mini Feaster's Attack. Mini Feaster enters Berserk State at low HP.

name: Mini Wonder
psi: Blackhole Jet: Creates a black hole at the enemy's location for 11s, continuously pulling in hostile units within 17m and dealing 208.30% SP.ATK DMG every 1.2s. Consumes 500 Psi Energy.
passive: Gravitas: After casting the skill, generates a Gravity Orb nearby every 20s, lasting 6s. Automatically absorbs bullets and projectiles within 3m.

name: Mr Wish
psi: Coin Fire: Flips the coin of fate 6 times in a row, letting luck decide the outcome. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Big Winner: Increases the success rate of all probability-based skills by 15%.

name: Nutcracker
psi: Purge Directive: Fires wildly, randomly targeting enemies with 10 consecutive shots, each dealing 264% P.ATK DMG. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Tin Soldier Never Dies: Becomes immune to damage for 2s when receiving a fatal blow. Cooldown: 60s.

name: Orb Lightning
psi: Charge & Thunder Call: Orb Lightning charges itself with electricity, striking each enemy within range every 3s for 291% SP.ATK DMG. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Suppression Aura: Every 10s, extends the battle skill cooldown of surrounding hostile units by 8.2%.

name: Paper Doll
psi: Paper Talisman Protection: Dispels all Deviated states from allies and grants Super Armor for 25s. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Heian-kyo: Every 8s, dispels one ally's Deviated state and increases their Attack by 13%.

name: Party Monkey
psi: Party Kickoff: Frantically strikes a gong, randomly refreshing 2-4 battle skill cooldowns for all teammates. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Big Ruckus: Randomly reduces the cooldown of one battle skill by 2s every 5s.

name: Polar Jelly
psi: Low-Temperature Smoke: Releases freezing mist for 10s, dealing 100.6% SP.ATK DMG over time to enemies within the mist and causing them to lose their target. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Frozen Heart: Dealing damage has a 20% chance to freeze the target for 0.5s. Cooldown: 5s.

name: Pup Buddy
psi: Featherweight Parade: Generates a floating balloon above nearby Deviations, putting them in a floating state for 20s. Floating Deviations cannot attack or move. Destroying the balloon prematurely ends the floating state. Consumess 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Inflate: Recovers 0.6% HP every 0.5s while out of combat.

name: Pyro Dino
psi: Pyro Dino Bombardment: Combines Telekinetic Hand with Pyro Dino magic, causing the Pyro Dino to spew explosive flame orbs at enemies. Consumes 600 Psi Energy.
passive: Flame Queen: Gains +80% SP.ATK DMG for 3s when attacking Burned units.

name: Rainman
psi: Downpour: Summons a raincloud over the target, pouring heavy rain that deals SP.ATK DMG equal to 34% Attack + 1% current HP + 0.50% Max HP to all enemies in range every 0.3s. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Rain Shower: Restores 1.30% Max HP when attacked, with a 10s cooldown.

name: Rebecca
psi: Beacon of Hope: Teleports to the player to jointly release energy, making all nearby allies (except self) invincible for 9s. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Empathy: Damage taken by the player's Deviations is evenly distributed among all active Deviations on the battlefield.

name: Shattered Maiden
psi: Dissociation: Fires a beam forward for 4s, dealing 144% SP.ATK DMG every 0.3s. Targets staying in the beam for 1s are petrified for 8s. Petrified targets take 75% increased P.ATK DMG and 75% less SP.ATK DMG. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Shy: Every 10s, enters a special state for 10s, becoming immune to control effects and gaining 5% increased Attack.

name: Snow Globe
psi: Frozen Snowscape: Summons a blizzard around, dealing 160% SP.ATK DMG every 0.5s for 4s and applying a mark. At 3 marks, the target is frozen for 5s. Consumes 500 Psi Energy.
passive: Snowscape: During snowy weather, SP.ATK +100%.

name: Snowsprite
psi: Frozen Soul: Creates a large ice crystal that charges for 5s before launching, dealing 1,416% SP.ATK DMG in an 8m radius and knocking down targets. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Chilling Cold: Each time damage is dealt to a target, increases the caster's SP.ATK by 5%, stacking up to 20 times. Switching targets resets the effect.

name: Soul Summoner
psi: Whoosh!: Draws the bow and fires three consecutive arrows at the enemy target, dealing SP.ATK DMG to all enemies in their path plus additional SP.ATK DMG based on Attack; the additional damage is equal to a percentage of the target's Max HP, ignoring shields. The first two arrows deal 94.77% SP.ATK DMG plus additional SP.ATK DMG equal to 0.22% to 1.11% of the target's Max HP; the third arrow deals 189.53% SP.ATK DMG plus additional SP.ATK DMG equal to 0.44% to 2.21% of the target's Max HP. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Master Archer: When dealing DMG, reduces the target's Elemental Defense by 1.60%. Stacks up to 10 times and lasts 5s.

name: Space Turner
psi: Chaotic Space: Generates a continuous spatial collapse, teleporting random distant enemies nearby and dealing 763% P.ATK DMG each time. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Relaxation: Increases P.DEF and SP.DEF by 15% when enemies are nearby; increases P.ATK by 30% when no enemies are present.

name: Strange Door
psi: Rift Door: Taunts nearby Deviations, gains a shield equal to 4.4% of Max HP, and launches elemental orbs to retaliate upon being hit, dealing SP.ATK DMG equal to 120% Attack. Retaliations have a minimum interval of 0.5s. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Dimensional Accumulation: Stores 30% of damage taken as Rift Energy. For every 30% of Max HP stored as Rift Energy, gains one stack of Dimension, increasing Elemental DMG by 30% per stack (max 3 stacks). Energy clears if no damage is taken for a while.

name: Tar Pudding
psi: Giant Molotov Cocktail: Tar Pudding becomes frenzied, creating an 8m-radius burning aura around itself for 10 seconds. Enemies within range take 55.17% SP.ATK DMG per second, and those with Flammable status are detonated, dealing 356.4% AoE SP.ATK DMG in a 3m radius. After entering battle, each use of Crude Oil Digging or Crude Oil Spill increases Molotov Cocktail DMG by 25% (max 100%). Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Crude Oil Digging: Every 40s, digs up oil beneath itself, increasing its own SP.ATK by 20% for 10s and leaving a 2m-radius oil pool lasting 20s. Enemies passing through the oil pool become Flammable. Flammable enemies ignited by fire-based skills take 17.49% SP.ATK DMG per second with Burn effect for 8s.

name: Upper World Spawn
psi: Angel's Protection: Summons wings to protect allied Deviations. 110% of DMG they take is reflected as SP.ATK DMG to attackers for 10s. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Eggshell Protection: Reflects 20% of DMG received back to the attacker.

name: Voodoo Doll
psi: Doom Curse: Voodoo Doll curses all enemies, applying Heal Block and converting 200% of healing received into DMG for 25s. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Rusty Nail: Units damaged by the Voodoo Doll are inflicted with Healing Block, nullifying all healing effects for 5s.

name: Whalepup
psi: Underwater World: Enter the underwater world for 10s. Every 5s, all enemies within a 25m radius are trapped in the water prison, triggering twice in total. The water prison lasts 4s before exploding, dealing 259.5% SP.ATK DMG. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Water Prison: When dealing damage, suspends the target in a water prison for 3s. Can only trigger once on the same target within 10s. When the water prison expires, it explodes, dealing SP.ATK DMG equal to 70% of Attack to the target.

name: ZapCam
psi: Data needed
passive: Data needed

name: Zapamander
psi: Thunder's Wrath: Zapamander summons lightning to strike all enemies within a 20m radius, dealing 773.3% SP.ATK DMG. For each stack of Power Surge on the target, this damage increases by 10%.
passive: Static Field: Each time a battle skill is cast, deals true damage equal to 0.14% of Max HP to all enemies within a 12m radius.

name: Zeno Purifier
psi: Omnislash: Locks onto an enemy unit and performs 6 consecutive blink slashes, each dealing 208.5% P.ATK DMG. Critical Hits additionally reduce 2% of the target's current HP (up to 1,403). Consumes 280 Psi Energy.
passive: Warrior's Heart: Each successful hit increases Crit Rate by 2%, stacking up to 20 times.
